#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<sstream>
#define loop(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define revloop(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>b;i--)
#define mod 1000000007
#define c 100005
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
   cin.tie(0);
   ll t,f,h,w,i,ar,ans,m;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   { cin>>f>>h>>w;
     ans=INT_MAX;
     ll cut[f];
     loop(i,0,f)
       cin>>cut[i];
     sort(cut,cut+f);
     m=0;
     loop(i,0,f)
     { ar=(cut[i]-m)*h;
       if(ar<ans)
    	   ans=ar;
       m=cut[i];
     }
     ar=(w-cut[i-1])*h;
     cout<<min(ar,ans)<<endl;
   }
   return 0;
}
